RelatedSentence: We have finalized an agreement with the Nigerians to share intelligence with them , specifically intelligence related to the kidnapped girls , Pentagon spokesman Army Col. Steve Warren said Monday .
We have finalized an agreement with the Nigerians to share intelligence with them , specifically intelligence related to the kidnapped girls , Pentagon spokesman Army Col. Steve Warren said Monday .
The Nigerians will only see the analysis of the intelligence , he said , such as specific pictures or limited pieces of information directly relevant to finding the girls .
